title: 2008 Hyundai Accent (not running)
item_description:

    • Planned Non-Op Registration

Interior

Note: The Seller is a mechanic and processed the lien sale paperwork. The Liensale packet will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the pickup. This vehicle is being sold "as-is" with lien sale paperwork and in non-running condition. Smog will not be performed by the Seller, it will be the Buyer's responsibility for repairs and smog. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both the buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, transfer, taxes, registration, and fees due to California DMV."
